tentpoles.description: Lira discovers timestamp discrepancies in ansible transmissions from Earth - doesn't align with light-speed verification
Kaito brings physical evidence from Earth relay contradicting official ansible messages, conspiracy confirmed
Lira uncovers ansible operators have been modifying messages for decades to prevent colonial conflicts
Revelation: Earth's ansible went silent 40 years ago, guild has been fabricating all Earth messages since
Truth spreads to some colonies, information warfare erupts, Lira becomes fugitive, civilization fracturing

causal_chains.effect: Begins covert investigation, partners with Kaito (ch5)
Realizes ansible guild can fabricate history (ch10)
Colonies fracture over truth, information warfare begins (ch20)

planted_elements.significance: Proves Earth made contact before going silent
Contains truth about why Earth sacrificed itself
He was there when Earth detonated ansible

tentpoles.description: Colonial wars erupt - what colonies believe Earth said determines political legitimacy and power
Zara proves Earth made alien contact 40 years ago - FTL-capable species exists
Truth revealed: Earth was quarantined for attempting to share ansible tech, sacrificed itself to protect colonies
Alien ships detected at edge of colonial space, three years from arrival
Colonies split between Contact factions (embrace aliens) and Memory factions (preserve independence)
Aliens arrive - reveal ansible technology attracts Harvesters (Von Neumann probes that destroy ansible civilizations)
Harvesters detected, three years away, colonial ansible network has been broadcasting beacon for 40 years
Choice presented: shut down ansibles (isolation, survival) or keep network (unity, potential extinction)
Lira broadcasts complete truth to all colonies simultaneously, then initiates ansible network destruction
Ansible destroyed, Harvesters pass by, humanity survives but 47 colonies now permanently isolated, beginning divergence into separate species, Kaito last person to visit multiple human worlds
